WelcomeMessagePainting: Welcome to the DeepFake Photobooth by ML6! In this application you can swap your face into a painting to become part of history!
GettingStarted: To get started we need you to take a picture of your face. Press the button at the bottom of the screen to start the camera!
PressButtonBelow: Press the button at the bottom of the screen to continue
MachineSearchingFace: Hold on while the machine searches for your face!
FaceNotVisible: Unfortunately your face is not visible to the machine. Please ensure your face is clearly visible by retaking your picture.
MultipleFacesVisible: More than one face was detected. Please ensure only a single face is visible by retaking you picture.
MachineLikesPicture: The machine likes your picture! Are you happy with it too?
NoChosenImage: You have not chosen an image yet. Press on any picture that you like to select it
ScanQR: Scan the QR code to download and share your digital souvenir!
GenericErrorMessage: An error occured. Please try again.
PrivacyPolicyDescription: Scan QR-code to view privacy policy
ShareYourPictureDescription: Note this page will only be available today. Tomorrow, all pictures will have been deleted. Make sure to download your copy today.
ShareMessageText: I just swapped my face with a famous visual thanks to the ML6 DeepFake Photobooth! Can you recognize me ;)?
WelcomeMsg: Welcome to the souvenir photobooth! In this application you can swap your face into some of the most world famous paintings
SelectPainting: Press enter to select your painting
BackspaceBack: Press backspace to go back a step
CycleLeft: Press a or <0></0> to cycle left
CycleRight: Press d or <0></0> to cycle right
ErrorOccured: An error occured. Press enter to try again
NForNewPic: An error occured, press n to take a new picture
HappyWithPic: Are you happy with this picture?
PleaseRetakePicture: Please go back a step and retake your picture
ErrorDetectingFace: Something went wrong with detecting your face
SwipePaintings: You can swipe to move trough the selection of paintings
ErrorSwapping: Something went wrong with swapping your face
ErrorUploading: Something went wrong uploading your result
StillThere: Are you still there? Press anywhere to continue
SelectPaintings: Alternatively you can press on a visible painting to select it
